entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned as laughing and giving a hug to his father. He is also described as leaping onto the train.

entities.name: mother
entities.description: The mother of James is mentioned as kissing him.

entities.name: father
entities.description: The father of James is mentioned as receiving a hug from James.

entities.name: thestrals
entities.description: Thestrals are described as gentle things and nothing scary about them. They are also mentioned as being seen by Harry and Albus.

relationships.description: James is kissed by his mother.
James gives a hug to his father.
